short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get more done, faster, with the power of your assistants at your fingertips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the power of your Dust directly into your browsing experience.

Access Dust assistants and conversations right from your browser tab. The extension enhances your browsing by letting you:
- Draft text using the webpage's context.
- Analyze and extract information from websites.
- Capture full-page screenshots directly in your conversation.
- Drag & drop images.
- Send content through the right-click menu.

This extension requires a Dust account to function.
 
ðŸ”’ Privacy & Security

We take your privacy seriously. The extension maintains a secure connection to your Dust account and only processes the content you explicitly choose to share. No unnecessary data collection, no surprises.
